resources.string: Make sure you are in same network and the server component is running correctly.
Please enter the IP of your Computer.
Please connect to your network to establish a connection to Pigment-desktop.
Please enable Wifi to connect with your network.
Connection timed out. Is the IP-Adress correct?

This application was designed to be used as color chooser and second interface while drawing, designing or editing photos on our computer, preferably with Photoshop. To make it work, you will need to install a second programm on your computer which you can download HERE.
This app was developed by Mirko Sowa during the project \'App develepoment with Android\' at the SLG Aachen High School.
